#summary Main documentation page for the project

= Getting started =
To make the toolbox functional:
  * Download it from the downloads page or checkout the svn,
  * Unzip it to any directory,
  * Add the main directory and the lib and etc directories to the matlab path,
  * Type _calib_ in the matlab command prompt, to open the principal window:

http://fabio.dias.googlepages.com/calib_inicial.png
